#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int i,t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s1,s2;
		int a1[26]={0},a2[26]={0};
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		for(i=0;i<s1.length();i++)
		{
			a1[s1[i]-97]++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<s2.length();i++)
		{
			a2[s2[i]-97]++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(a1[i]!=a2[i])
			break;
		}
		if(i!=26)
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}
}
